00023 #include <Champ_Fonc_Tabule.h>
00024 #include <Champ_Uniforme.h>

00028 Implemente_instanciable(Champ_Fonc_Tabule,"Champ_Fonc_Tabule",Champ_Fonc_base);
00029 // XD champ_fonc_tabule champ_don_base champ_fonc_tabule 0 Field that is tabulated as a function of another field.
00030 // XD  attr inco chaine inco 0 Name of the field (for example: temperature).
00031 // XD  attr dim int dim 0 Number of field components.
00032 // XD  attr bloc bloc_lecture bloc 0 Values (the table (the value of the field at any time is calculated by linear interpolation from this table) or the analytical expression (with keyword expression to use an analytical expression)).
00033 
00034 void Champ_Fonc_Tabule::Warn_old_chp_fonc_syntax(const char * nom_class, const Nom& val1, const Nom& val2, int& dim, Nom& param)
00035 {
00036   const bool isNum = Check_if_int(val1);
00037   if (!isNum) //!< val1 is not a num - this is the correct new syntax
00038     {
00039       param = val1;
00040       dim = atoi(val2);
00041       return;
00042     }
00043   else   //!< Detect old syntax and inform user
00044     {
00045       Cerr << "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" << finl;
00046       Cerr << "Error in call to " << nom_class << ":" << finl;
00047       Cerr << "The syntax has changed in version 1.8.2." << finl;
00048       Cerr << "You should now pass the dimension/number of components AFTER the field/parameter name." << finl;
00049       Cerr << "Please update your dataset or contact TRUST support team." << finl;
00050       Process::exit();
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void Champ_Fonc_Tabule::Warn_old_chp_fonc_syntax_V_184(const char * nom_class, const Nom& val,int& dim, int& old_synt)
00055 {
00056   const bool isNum = Check_if_int(val);
00057   if (isNum) //!< old syntax
00058     {
00059       Cerr << "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" << finl;
00060       Cerr << "Attention : you are using an old syntax for the class " << nom_class << " :" << finl;
00061       Cerr << "We are trying to fix this ..." << finl;
00062       dim = atoi(val);
00063       old_synt = 1;
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool Champ_Fonc_Tabule::Check_if_int(const Nom& val)
00068 {
00069   std::string s((const char*)val);
00070 // lambda checking whehter a char is not a digit:
00071   auto checkNotDig = [](unsigned char c) {  return !std::isdigit(c); };
00072   return (!s.empty() && std::find_if(s.begin(), s.end(), checkNotDig) == s.end());
00073 }

00075 Sortie& Champ_Fonc_Tabule::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00076 {
00077   return os;
00078 }
00079 
00080 // Precondition: seul les champs scalaires sont traites
00081 // Parametre: Entree& is
00082 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00083 // Valeurs par defaut:
00084 // Contraintes:
00085 // Acces: entree/sortie
00086 // Exception: accolade fermante attendue
00087 // Exception: accolade ouvrante attendue
00088 // Effets de bord:
00089 // Postcondition:
00090 //
00091 //
00092 //
00093 //
00094 //
00095 //
00096 //
00097 //
00098 //
00099 //! Lecture du Champ a partir d'un flot d'entree,<br>(On ne sait traiter que les champs scalaires.)<br>exemple:<br>Champ_Fonc_Tabule { probleme ch }<br>1 (nombre de composantes)<br>{<br>2<br>0 500 0 250  (ch(0)=0 \&\& ch(500)=250<br>}
00100 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00101 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00102 Contraintes: */
00103 Entree& Champ_Fonc_Tabule::readOn(Entree& is)
00104 {
00105   int nbcomp, old_table_syntax_ = 0;
00106   Nom motlu;
00107   const Motcle accolade_ouverte("{"), accolade_fermee("}");
00108   is >> motlu;
00109   if (motlu != accolade_ouverte)
00110     {
00111       noms_champs_parametre_.add(motlu);
00112       old_table_syntax_ = 1;
00113     }
00114   else
00115     {
00116       assert (old_table_syntax_ == 0);
00117       while (true)
00118         {
00119           is >> motlu;
00120           if (motlu == "}") break;
00121           noms_pbs_.add(motlu);
00122           is >> motlu;
00123           noms_champs_parametre_.add(motlu);
00124         }
00125     }
00126   const int nb_param = noms_champs_parametre_.size();
00127 
00128   if (old_table_syntax_ && noms_pbs_.size() != 0 && nb_param != 1)
00129     {
00130       Cerr << "What ??? Big problem in Champ_Fonc_Tabule::readOn !!!" << finl;
00131       throw;
00132     }
00133 
00134   is >> nbcomp;
00135   fixer_nb_comp(nbcomp);
00136   is >> motlu;
00137   if (motlu == accolade_ouverte)
00138     {
00139       /* 1. lecture de la grille de parametres */
00140       VECT(DoubleVect) params;
00141       for (int n = 0; n < nb_param; n++)
00142         {
00143           const int nb_val = lire_dimension(is, que_suis_je());
00144           DoubleVect param(nb_val);
00145           for (int i = 0; i < nb_val; i++) is >> param[i];
00146           params.add(param);
00147         }
00148 
00149       /* 2. lecture des valeurs des parametres */
00150 // taille totale du tableau de valeurs
00151       int size = nbcomp;
00152       for (int n = 0; n < nb_param; n++) size *= params[n].size();
00153 
00154 // lecture : tout dans un tableau 1D
00155       DoubleVect tab_valeurs(size);
00156       for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) is >> tab_valeurs[i];
00157       la_table.remplir(params, tab_valeurs);
00158 
00159       is >> motlu;
00160       if (motlu != accolade_fermee)
00161         {
00162           Cerr << "Error reading from an object of type Champ_Fonc_Tabule" << finl;
00163           Cerr << "We expected keyword } instead of " << motlu << finl;
00164           exit();
00165         }
00166     }
00167   else if (motlu=="fonction")
00168     {
00169       Cerr<<"The syntax has changed..." << finl;
00170       Cerr<<"The syntax is now Champ_Fonc_fonction 1 field_expression"<<finl;
00171       exit();
00172       Cerr<<"We read the analytic function "<<finl;
00173       la_table.lire_f(is,0);
00174     }
00175   else
00176     {
00177       Cerr << "Error reading from an object of type Champ_Fonc_Tabule" << finl;
00178       Cerr << "We expected keyword { or fonction instead of " << motlu << finl;
00179       exit();
00180     }
00181   return is;
00182 }
00183 
00184 Champ_base& Champ_Fonc_Tabule::affecter_(const Champ_base& ch)
00185 {
00186   if(!le_champ_tabule_discretise().non_nul())
00187     Cerr << le_nom() << "type : " << que_suis_je()
00188          << " can not be assigned to " << ch.le_nom()
00189          << " because " << le_nom() << " is incomplete " << finl;
00190   else
00191     {
00192       if(sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch))
00193         valeurs()=ch.valeurs()(0,0);
00194       else
00195         valeurs()=ch.valeurs();
00196     }
00197   return *this;
00198 }
